Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: Tune Raft snapshot default config parameters to align with hardcoded wal SegmentFileSize
Issue.description: etcd wal segment size is hardcoded to be 64MB in etcd/wal pkg. If we change {{SnapshotIntervalSize}} to 16MB, and {{MaxSnapshotFiles}} to 4, then in most cases (for small blocks), we would have no more than 2 segment files.
